tool_description: QR Code generator for PIX payments. Get a QR Code to receive payments via PIX. You make a POST request with some parameters and you get a base64 encoded image. Note that some parameters are mandatory and others are optional. Use the Glossary endpoint to see some request details.
name: PIX QR Code
title: PIX QR Code

api_list.name: Generate PIX QR Code
api_list.description: On this endpoint you get a QR Code to receive payments via PIX. Some fields are mandatory.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pix-qr-code1.p.rapidapi.com/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pix-qr-code1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pix-qr-code1.p.rapidapi.com/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pix-qr-code1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
